title: You know one thing that got removed and I miss, because it was hilarious?
body:
Gangplank announcer. Bring him back sometime (or add him as an option).

{{champion:41}}: Yer mate's feedin' the fishes!

replies.body:
I'd pay for this to return, and possibly more announcement packs.

(Announcer {{champion:14}} please).

{{champion:33}} ok
{{champion:33}} ok ok
{{champion:33}} ok ok ok

**YOU DIED? GET BACK UP AGAIN!**
YES!  A THOUSAND TIMES, YES!!!!
**YES! YES! FIRST BLOOD! BLOOD! KILL! DESTROY!**
I second this. I need a Tahm Kench, Nasus, or Kindred announcer.

When a low-HP enemy gets chased down by Singed, Yi or Quinn and dies to them....

{{champion:203}}: Those who run from death stood still in life.
Every time I Play Quinn, and I have my rank 3 ult, and the speed boost from base, I sort of feel like Wolf when I run down the enemy team who just barely won a small skirmish.
I'd be moist for a nasus announcer

Remember the storyteller Nasus when Ascencion/Azir has been teased?
Like that. That would be awesome! {{champion:75}}

Come on, I know deeply inside you want {{champion:202}} announcer pack.

We all want {{champion:202}} announcer pack.
*heavy breathing*
{{champion:202}} *"And now, the curtain rises..."*
{{champion:202}} They're gonna live, until they die.

{{champion:17}} 

(Welcome to Summoner's Rift) Welcome, Squad Teemo! Haha. Hahaha!
(You have been slain) You missed. Haha! Hahaha!
(Enemy double kill) You both missed. Haha! 
(Enemy triple kill) All of you missed.
(Enemy quadra kill) Stop missing.
(Enemy Penta Kill) Size doesn't mean everything.
(Ally tower destroyed) You were supposed to defend that.
(Ally Inhibitor destroyed) Bigger enemies are easier targets.
(Enemy tower destroyed) Captain Teemo, on duty! Haha! Hahaha!
(Enemy inhibitor destroyed) Armed and ready.
(Enemy Slain) That's gotta sting.
(Double Kill) Hut two.
(Triple Kill) Hut two three.
(Quadra Kill) Hut two three four.
(Penta Kill) Never underestimate the power of the scouts code.
(Victory) Victory.
(Defeat) Defeat.


{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

I used a mod from Wooxy that allowed me to have the Gangplank announcer, but with the recent patch, riot removed a sound file very important to deploy the Gangplank announcer. Now i'm sad {{champion:32}}
If BmB ever gets thrown into the rotation, this needs to be brought back 100%
I want them to add {{champion:103}} announcer, I would pay 50$ for that shit
I'd pay 2.65$ a minute for {{champion:40}} announcer to blow me away

I so want Riot to make announcer packs heck they did GP, they sort of done Aruelion Sol.

I want {{champion:119}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:68}} (super galaxy version){{champion:29}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:136}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:75}} (Infernal nasus) {{champion:222}}
Won't be the last body ta fall! Also, I would really like champion voice packs. They had them in dawngate and i purchased all of them, but only really used Zeri's
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} Your friend went BOOM! HAHAHAHAHAHA!
I want a {{champion:202}} announcer pack
2creepy4me

"You have created Artwork!" - normal
"Two down! Inspire me!" - slightly louder, a little excited
"Three down! Once more with Feeling!" - Says with a desire feeling, almost begging, loudly
"Quadrakill! PERFECTION!" - Climaxes, Orgasm sounds, laughs a little sometimes with extreme feeling
"You disappoint me you know. I refuse to say it." - gets all gloomy and basically hates you for doing that.
OK so as a not-so-secret Jhin art junkie I'd pay for his voice as an announcer a fortune. I'd be shaky as f* but WORTH.
Then Riot will nerf his voice into the ground just like the rest of his kit.

i mean he totally deserved it
